title: Wallabies 'Bring it on' Font Type
content:
Hi,

I am looking for the font Qantas used on its logojet supporting the Wallabies for the 2013 Lions Tour - BRING IT ON.

Thanks in advance!

Chris

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015124631im_/http:/typophile.com/files/VHVXG1_4872.jpg)
author: detaildude

comments.content: close to [Stencil Allround](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015124631/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letterwerk/stencil-allround/) but the G is a bit off.
Thanks! Stencil Allround looks very good. I'll see what I can do regarding the G.
